attributes.background: Harry Gregg is a survivor of the munich air disaster 6th February 1958 . Harry was injured in the disaster but was able to free himself and also saved a mother n child aswell as fellow team members he now has a foundation set up in his own name aswell

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
